    Doba Basilio (he/him)

    • Generation 2
    • Role: Spouse
    • Currently: Alive, in household
    • Traits:
      • Active
      • Self-assured
      • Delightful
      • Impulsive
      • Moody
    • Relationships:
      • Elmira Basilio (Wife)
      • Ajei Basilio (Daughter)
      • Miguel Basilio (Father-in-law)
      • Salim Basilio (Father-in-law)
      • Etan Basilio (Sibling-in-law)
      • Cosmo (Pet, Cat)

    Biography

    Pre-Legacy

    Doba Basilio lived a pretty average life, moving from reservation to reservation as his parents' work demanded it. But that work didn't offer him much time with them. Instead, he spent his time getting into urban exploration, digging through abandoned buildings just for the fun of it. But, he pushed his luck too far, and one night was bitten by...something he couldn't catch a sight of. That something turned out to be a werewolf, passing its curse along to him. Horrified of what he'd become, Doba ran away, moving as far as he could with the money he could scrape, to try and find a cure for himself.

    Young Adulthood

    Scavenging through every werewolf forum he could, Doba met Elmira Basilio, who was just as interested in the speculation about the werewolf curse as he was...somehow even more than he was. They hit it off immediately when they finally met in person, and Doba knew he was in love. When he came clean about the truth of his...interest in werewolves, Elmira accepted him brazenly, admitting she liked him even more because of it. He moved into the Basilio house very shortly after that, with his newly adopted cat, Cosmo, after learning Elmira was pregnant.

    Last Sunrise est. 2023 ☆ Last updated Fri Jul 11 2025
